finger.translation[0].definitions[0].def: one of the four long thin parts on your hand, not including your thumb
finger.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The woman had a ring on her finger, so I assumed she was married.
She ran her fingers through his hair.
run your fingers through/over/along etc something
finger.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the part of a glove that covers your finger
finger.translation[0].definitions[2].def: anything that is long and thin, like the shape of a finger, especially a piece of land, an area of water, or a piece of food

finger.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to touch or handle something with your fingers
